whychooseuscontent.heading: Whether you’re choosing a natural gas supplier for the first time or switching from your current utility, here are four solid reasons to go with Grand Rapids Energy:
whychooseuscontent.termsdescription: [Purchase ENERGY STAR approved kitchen appliances that cook more efficiently.,]
whychooseuscontent.text:
1. We’re budget conscious.
    At Grand Rapids Energy®, we understand the importance of watching your monthly budget. That’s why we’re all about maximizing savings. We keep a sharp eye on competitors’ natural gas rates so that when you compare them, we’re the natural choice!

  2. We aim to please.
    Your utility can only offer you a variable plan. Want to lock in your rate with a fixed plan? GRE offers fixed plans and variable plans designed to suit your needs. Find the one that’s right for you.

  3. We care about our customers.
    Our exceptional customer service is at the ready. Call 1-800-841-1541 to speak with one of our representatives.

  4. We offer outstanding perks.
    Earn Delta SkyMiles just for paying your natural gas bill. Earn sweet rewards when you refer friends to sign up for GRE. Check out the details of our Delta Skymiles and Refer a Friend programs.
